taxon_name.authority: A. St.-Hilaire in A. St.-Hilaire et al.

bio:treatment.description: Plants perennial. Stems 1–3(–5), erect, gray-green, 2–2.5 dm, white-gray canescent. Leaf blades gray-green or green, ovate, unlobed or 3-lobed, 5–8 cm, wrinkled, not rugose, base cuneate, margins coarsely toothed, surfaces stellate-pubescent. Inflorescences racemose, open, 3–6-flowered, tip not leafy; involucellar bractlets tan. Flowers: sepals 11–15 mm; petals red-orange, 15–22 mm; anthers yellow. Schizocarps flattened-spheric; mericarps 13, 3–6 × 2–4.5 mm, chartaceous, nonreticulate dehiscent part 60% of height, tip rounded, indehiscent part not wider than dehiscent part. Seeds 1 or 2 per mericarp, brown or black, minutely pubescent.
